mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT( PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_STORE_ID, PRODUCT_STORE_NAME, SELLER_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_BUNDLE, PRODUCT_STOCK ) VALUES ( PRODUCT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{productStoreId}, #{productStoreName}, #{sellerId}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productBundle}, #{productStock} )

INSERT INTO PRODUCT_CATEGORY( PRODUCT_ID, MAIN_CATEGORY_ID, SUB_CATEGORY_ID, MAIN_CATEGORY_NAME, SUB_CATEGORY_NAME ) VALUES ( #{productId}, #{mainCategoryId}, #{subCategoryId}, #{mainCategoryName}, #{subCategoryName} )
mapper.select: SELECT MAIN_CATEGORY_NAME FROM MAIN_CATEGORY WHERE MAIN_CATEGORY_ID = #{mainCategoryId}
SELECT * FROM SUB_CATEGORY WHERE MAIN_CATEGORY_ID = #{mainCategoryId} ORDER BY SUB_CATEGORY_ID ASC
SELECT SUB_CATEGORY_NAME FROM SUB_CATEGORY WHERE SUB_CATEGORY_ID = #{subCategoryId}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT
PRODUCT_STOCK > 0
AND PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRODUCT_STORE_ID = #{productStoreId}, PRODUCT_STORE_NAME = #{productStoreName}, PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName}, PRODUCT_PRICE = #{productPrice}, PRODUCT_BUNDLE = #{productBundle}, PRODUCT_STOCK = #{productStock} WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}

UPDATE PRODUCT_CATEGORY SET MAIN_CATEGORY_ID = #{mainCategoryId}, SUB_CATEGORY_ID = #{subCategoryId}, MAIN_CATEGORY_NAME = #{mainCategoryName}, SUB_CATEGORY_NAME = #{subCategoryName} WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
UPDATE SUB_CATEGORY SET MAIN_CATEGORY_ID = #{mainCategoryId}, SUB_CATEGORY_NAME = #{subCategoryName} WHERE SUB_CATEGORY_ID = #{subCategoryId}
